remark.ch: 中高級課程，大學部課程，限修過日文二B者選修。

goal.en: This course aims to prepare beginner or intermediate Japanese language learners before taking upper-intermediate or advanced Japanese courses. The communicative teaching approach implemented in this course will help learners: 1. Combine their previous knowledge of Japanese with their current knowledge of Japanese. 2. Use the newly acquired grammar rules and vocabulary to improve their comprehension of listening, speaking, reading and writing skills in Japanese. 3. Increase their motivation to take the Japanese Language Proficiency Test, which can help them understand the added benefits of learning Japanese and find jobs that require good Japanese skills. 4. And finally gain the ability to self-study Japanese
goal.ch: 本課程是從初中級邁入中高級的銜接課程‚期望在以溝通為目的的教學目標之下, 讓學習者可以: 1. 整合歸納以往所習得的基礎。 2. 適時加入本課程的文法概念及語彙,串連出會話、書寫、閱讀、聽力等整合性運用的能力‚厚植日語聽、說、讀、寫的實力。 3. 鼓勵學習者參加日本語能力檢定‚提升語言學習的附加價值‚為日後的學習及就業做好準備。 4. 訓練學習者未來自我學習的能力。
